name: Satellite Reign
summary: Satellite Reign is a real-time, class-based strategy game, set in an open-world cyberpunk city. You command a group of 4 agents through rain-soaked, neon-lit streets, where the law is the will of mega-corporations.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SLG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年8月28日
  • 售价: ￥88
  • 官方网站: http://www.satellitereign.com/
  • 开发商: 5 Lives Studios
  • 发行: 5 Lives Studios
